text: Ilgiz Tantashev (born 5 April 1984) is an Uzbek professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2013.FIFA. "Uzbekistan: Referees". He refereed some matches in AFC Champions League. ==AFC Asian Cup== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:1em auto 1em auto; text- align:center; font-size:small;" ! colspan="4" | 2019 AFC Asian Cup – United Arab Emirates |- !
